message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.CR 

This paper is about deep representation learning for person re-identification, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper proposes a new loss function to improve the discriminative power of the learned representations, which is related to machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL), so cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely category. Additionally, the paper uses human body parts as a way to improve the representation learning, which is related to multimedia (MM) and image retrieval (IR), so cs.MM and cs.IR are also possible categories. Finally, the paper discusses the limitations of current approaches and proposes a new method to address them, which is related to cryptography and security (cs.CR), so this is also a possible category.
